title: Keegan Swenson Aims to Shatter His Own Leadville Record—This Time with Drop Bars
content:
"I know they're faster," Swenson says. "If I can ride downhill quickly I know it's the fastest bike. It's hard to say how much but I think it's worth at least a few minutes."

Read the full article at Keegan Swenson Aims to Shatter His Own Leadville Record—This Time with Drop Bars on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
